citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12 pm on
14-MAR-18.
Knocked on door, honked horn, called- not able to leave message, waited 30m
